name: Flying Whale (Faust.Shao)
description:
The purpose of the game is to use your (the whale!) movement and water spout to move the box until it touches the switch! The water spout can pass through the web but can't pass the wall! Also, pay attention to those traps that may destroy your box!

游戏的目的是使用你（鲸鱼！）的运动和水柱移动盒子，让它启动开关！水柱可以穿过网格，但会被墙挡住！同时也要小心那些会破坏盒子的陷阱!

Here are simple controls of the game:  游戏的控制方式如下

W, A, S, DWhale Movement/移动鲸鱼Q, ECamera Rotation/旋转镜头SpaceFloat Upward/上浮AltDive Downward/下潜PSpout Water/喷水住MStart Menu/主菜单RRestart/重新开始本关卡
